alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Harrison; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:05PM EDT until June 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Harrison County in east central Ohio... Coshocton County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Muskingum County in east central Ohio... Southern Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 404 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Farmerstown to near Gambier, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Coshocton, Uhrichsville, Newcomerstown, West Lafayette, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Gnadenhutten, Tuscarawas, Baltic, Warsaw, Port Washington, and Conesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
